# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width)
    lines = ""
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(text, '\n') # 以换行符为分隔符分割文本
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            lines *= current_line * "\n"
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    return lines * current_line # 加上最后一行
end

# 例子
text = "Hello there, how are you today? This is a very long sentence that should be wrapped."
wrap_string(text, 15)  # 应该返回: "Hello there,\nhow are you today?\nThis is a very long\nsentence that should\nbe wrapped."
```
